attributes.action: Due to the EHRC report on systematic/endemic Anti-Semitism in the Labour party
attributes.additional_details: Anti-Semitism is one of the oldest , if not the oldest , form of hate crime on the planet and it must be driven out of all public life, we must make a point that political parties will be held legally responsible for their elected members activities along with their activists
attributes.background: Endemic Anti-Semitism in the Labour Party must be dealt with legally with a full Judge led investigation and criminal charges of all those found liable, Jeremy Corbyn must be stripped of his Privy Council status and removed from all political activities for LIFE,Baroness Chakrabarti must lose title

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or members of the House of Lords to lose their jobs. Petitions cannot override anyone's right to due process.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556745
